entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Moose Jaw
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:42 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Moose Jaw 2:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -10.5°C
Wind: E 39 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow this evening. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023
